EmailTemplate.description: Subject: Office Depot Strategic Collaboration with Alibaba.com Benefit
EmailTemplate.name: Alibaba Benefit Customer Level
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Business Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on my call. Please let me know when you are available to talk about important updates and to learn how you can benefit from our strategic collaboration with Alibaba, one of the worldâ€™s largest B2B trading platforms. Looking forward to speaking with you soon.
https://activity.alibaba.com/sale/OD-Hospitality.html
Our Procurement Registration and/or In-Store, Store Purchasing Card (Mobile SPC) Program allow you to receive the in-store price or your business-discounted pricing (whichever is lower), including copy & print discounts, when you shop at any of our retail locations.
Office Depot National Business Resources:
Customer Service: 1.888.777.4044 Avendra Customer Service: 866.308.0806 Billing Support: 1.800.721.6592 OPT. 3 or abbillingsupport@officedepot.com Invoice request: inv-pods@officedepot.com E-Commerce (Login & Password Help Desk): 1.800.269.6888 or ecsupport@officedepot.com
Looking forward to speaking with you soon!
Sincerely, Karen Daniel Inside Sales, Business Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. Tel: 1-855-337-6811 Ext 12842 | karen.daniel@officedepot.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
